PREPPhrase: be convenient to/for... 对...方便
come in handy 迟早有用

perceive sb. do/doing sth. 察觉到某人做/正在做某事
be perceive as 被认为
be opposed to 反对...

refer to... 提到
refer sb./sth. to sb. 把某人介绍给某人
with reference to... 关于...

take delight in doing... 以做...为乐
to sb's delight 让某人高兴的是
in terminal decline 越来越糟
be suitable for/to 适合于...

be bound to 一定会
be bound up in sth. 忙于某事
by/in leaps and bounds 极其迅速地

skip school/class 逃课
skip a year/grade 跳级
skip off 突然溜走
compensate for 弥补
compulsory schooling/education 义务教育

be beneath one's dignity 有失体面
stand on one's dignity 维持尊严
narrow...down 缩小...的范围
shrink from doing... 畏缩不敢做
enlarge on/upon 详述

equip...with... 以...配备
equip...to do... 使...有能力做...
expose...to... 将...暴露在...之下
thrive on 靠...成功

idle away 虚度光阴
idle about 无所事事
be diligent in 努力干
at leisure 从容的
forge ahead 稳步前进

inquire after 问起某人情况
inquire into 调查

be keen on doing sth. 热衷于做某事
be keen to do sth. 太想做某事

be eager for sth. 渴望得到某物
be eager to do sth. 渴望做某事
as the proverb says 俗话说
underthe banner of... 打着...的旗号
